title: Silver support mains?
body: ADC main looking for a support main to climb with, hit me up if interested!

replies.body:
Add me man: TheSpawnMan.

I'm Bronze 2 atm, but I was at Silver 2 last season before I got banned (long story). I am only stuck down here because I don't have any decent ADCs to duo with. As a support main, you rely on your team, which is at best 50/50, so when it's +17lp for a win, and -18lp for a lossâ€¦ well you do the math lol.

Go for a 5 man stack, Rooks. If you duo, you'll be placed with 3 other noobs. And if you're in the same lane, that means gg.
Do what Princess Yaia does, play with people a division above you in a stack, you'll climb this way :)

I would
But if you're anything like everyone i've had today, you'd have no idea how Taric works and will epically screw me over. 
Willing to try anyway if youre still up for it tomorrow.
